column.name: country_code
column.remarks: Can be ISO2 or ISO3

column.name: geodetic_datum
column.remarks: North America Datum or World geodetic coordinate system

column.name: location_level1
column.remarks: Province, district or region

column.name: location_level2
column.remarks: municipality, district

column.name: location_level3
column.remarks: Administrative leve i.e city,down

column.name: date_observed
column.remarks: Date when it was detected

column.name: date_identified
column.remarks: Date when it was identified

column.name: date_recorded
column.remarks: Date when it was recorded into the system

column.name: date_updated
column.remarks: Date the record was updated

column.name: pathogen_nativity
column.remarks: Native or Introduced

column.name: pathogen_detection_status
column.remarks: Detected, Undetected

column.name: pathogen_category
column.remarks: Virus, Bacteria, Nematode

column.name: pathogen_vector
column.remarks: Vector of the pathogen

column.name: pathogen_identification_method
column.remarks: This can contain multiple identification methods (PCR,ELISA)

column.name: pathogen_verification_method
column.remarks: This can contain multiple verification methods

column.name: pathogen_status
column.remarks: Status of the pathogen at time of recording (Treated, Untreated)

column.name: pathogen_record_basis
column.remarks: The basis of the occurrence (Human observation)

column.name: severity_number_scale
column.remarks: Severity scale on an number level (5)

column.name: severity_percentage_scale
column.remarks: Severity scale on an percentage level

column.name: severity_range_scale
column.remarks: Severity scale on an range level (1-5,4-9)

column.name: pathogen_incidence
column.remarks: Severity scale on an percentage level

column.name: area_unit
column.remarks: Area measurement unit ha,acre,sqm

column.name: sampled_area_size
column.remarks: Size of area sampled

column.name: affected_area_size
column.remarks: Size of area affected

column.name: sample_source
column.remarks: Source of the sample i.e Field, greenhouse, lab

column.name: sample_desc
column.remarks: Description of the sample i.e roots, leaves

column.name: sample_units
column.remarks: Unit of measure (individuals, adults, grams, etc.)

column.name: data_collection_method
column.remarks: Methodology/protocol used to take the data (Aerial survey)

column.name: genbank_accession_number
column.remarks: GeneBank number for identification and confirmation

column.name: original_system_id
column.remarks: In the case of data from an aggregator, the unique identifier from the original data set. Used in cases where two aggregators may encounter the same data.

column.name: contributing_system_id
column.remarks: Unique identifier from system contributing data for followup and updating
